title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 102.2 - Required use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 102.2 - Required use

State Regulations

Elementary and secondary schools shall administer such
examinations as are designated by the commissioner as necessary for proper
supervision or evaluation of educational programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
102.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
